input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Investment Dashboard Freezing

The investment analytics dashboard was unable to visualize data properly due to a lack of resources in the Cassandra 4.0 database. After restarting the server and reviewing SQL connections, the issue still exists You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. Assistance is needed to fix this and ensure the dashboard operates smoothly. My name is Sophia Rossi.
